类型: Color: A04-golden Frame Brown LensLens Width: 47 Millimeters
评论详情: The design is awesome, the glare reduction is very good, and people have complimented me on them... but they have one major flaw. The lenses spin in their frame. Why does this matter? Polarized lenses. Try looking at your screen with a pair and tilting your head 90° to one side. You may notice the screen turn dark. If the lenses don't remain in position, suddenly you're dealing with one lens that's black when looking at a screen, while the other is normal.  I'm frustrated with having to keep spinning the lenses, and at this point I don't even know which way is up. I wanted to buy more from this brand, but this one flaw is putting me off too much.
